metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3164 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Drupal 6.x before 6.38, 7.x before 7.43, and 8.x before 8.0.4 might allow remote attackers to conduct open redirect attacks by leveraging (1) custom code or (2) a form shown on a 404 error page, related to path manipulation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3164` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.43-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.43-1').
